JKM JK42HS48-2504
Nema 17 42mm Hybrid Stepper Motor 70oz-in 48mm 2.5A For CNC Router

Step Angle     = 1.8°
rated current  = 2.5A
Shaft Radial Play 	0.02Max. (450g-load)
Shaft Axial Play 	0.08Max. (450g-load)
Max. radial force 	28N (20mm from the flange)
Max. axial force 	10N


Holding Torque = 5.0kg.cm 70oz.in
Voltage        = 12..36V

Shaft Diameter = 5mm
Shaft length   = 24mm
Weight         = 340g

RED coil1.A
GRN coil1.C
YEL coil2.B
BLU coil2.D
